title: Fuel price revision long overdue: Cabraal
content: The Governor of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka, Ajith Nivard Cabraal states that Sri Lanka’s fuel price revision is long overdue.  In a tweet, he mentioned that Sri Lanka’s diesel pump prices are in some instances less than half of some countries in the region. Meanwhile, the Minister of Energy, Udaya Gammanpila previously stated that reports of an overnight fuel price hike are false.
